DOC.brief_summary: Subjects receive single oral dose radioactive ASP1707 Day 1 . Blood , plasma , urine feces sample collect analysis 14C-radioactivity ASP1707 . Metabolites collect least 144 hour dose .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Effect ASP1707 Bodies Healthy Male Subjects After Single Dose Radioactive ASP1707
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects admit clinic Day -1 receive single oral dose 14C-labeled ASP1707 Day 1 . They remain clinic 6 day discharge Day 7 sufficient recovery administer radioactivity achieve , total excretion ( urine + feces ) per 24 hour less 1 % administer dose 2 consecutive 24-hour interval . If condition meet , residential period may prolong maximum 3 day . If time one condition still meet , subject request continue collect urine and/or feces home another 2 day . If additional 2 day one condition still meet , condition recovery radioactivity disregard . Therefore total excretion condition meet collect 24-hour interval urine feces week 2 week . If excretion condition still meet time , sample collect subject discharge study .
DOC.criteria: Subjects must surgically sterilize use condom must practice effective contraceptive method prevent pregnancy . Body Mass Index equal 18.5 less 30.0 kg/m2 . Regular defecation pattern ( minimum per day ) . Any liver function test upper limit normal . Exposure radiation diagnostic reason ( except dental Xrays plain Xrays thorax bony skeleton ( exclude spinal column ) ) , work participation clinical study previous year . Any use drug abuse within 3 month prior admission Clinical Unit . History smoke 10 cigarette ( equivalent amount tobacco ) per day within 3 month prior admission Clinical Unit . Donation blood blood product within 3 month prior admission Clinical Unit . Positive serology test Hepatitis B Surface Antigen ( HBsAg ) , anti Hepatitis A Virus ( HAV ) Immunoglobulin M ( IgM ) , anti Hepatitis C Virus ( HCV ) anti Human Immunodeficiency Virus ( HIV ) 1+2 .
